Reviews.Content: Great little hotel Classy little business hotel in the west end. I stayed here to visit friends who conveniently live on the same street. It is close to the parks and the festival halls but a good 20 minute walk to the train station, although the tram stop is very close.I would definitely use this hotel again when visiting my friends. If I were coming to Frankfurt as a tourist I would stay somewhere more central, although Frankfurt is so small that I walked pretty much everywhere.Staff are friendly and attentive, rooms are clean and bathroom spacious. Like most hotels in Frankfurt, it is more geared towards business users.
Reviews.Author: Dsleazy

Reviews.Content: Great Place and Staff Near the Messe. Great Small Hotel, large lavishly decorated room,friendly staff. Tram line ablock away to main station. Stayed here in Dec 2003 and on 4 other occaisions. Can park on the street or in hotel garage. Quiet area with University 3 blocks north.
Reviews.Author: billhar1
